changelog.title: Official Launch
new: Guitardex is launched to the public.

changelog.title: Launched Closed Beta
new: Guitardex is launched to a select group of volunteer testers of the end-users: Learners, Teachers, and Professional Musicians.

changelog.title: Created Necessary Pages
new: Added pages Help, About, and Community. Development (this) page was also added.

changelog.title: My Guitardex UX
new: Added a way to delete individual entries of the Guitardex.
Added a way to delete all entries of the Guitardex.
Added a way to re-order entries of the Guitardex, which also updates the Guitardex's browser save accordingly.

changelog.title: My Guitardex
new: 'My Guitardex' page displays the saved techniques of the end-user.
Encodes the save configuration to a short URL to share the user's Guitardex with others.
Added automatic decoding of a custom Guitardex URL upon visit to the site via the URL.

changelog.title: Technique Search
new: Added a Searchbar that queries search terms of the technique titles and their tags.
Added Guitardex browser saving functionality and put a save button on the Searchbar page and each individual technique page.

changelog.title: Technique Pages
new: Created the content structure to individually generate technique pages.
Created template skeletons of what the technique pages would look like.

changelog.title: Dark Mode
new: Allows end-users to freely toggle between light and dark theme (defaults to light).
User's browser remembers the color mode preference of the end-user.
